name: Happy-cli
body:
## Welcome Get happy news right from your command line! ### How to Install First, you must have npm installed.
Then, _sudo npm install -g happy-cli_
Warning: Make sure you install it globally. ### Usage From the command line, type _happy_
That's it! ### Support or Contact Having trouble? Contact me per [email](mailto:h.orefice@gmail.com).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
